attributes.action: I have no faith or trust in Prime Minister Theresa May
attributes.additional_details: Sickening to note that Britain has got to pay £39 Billion to the EU when it is not required in LAW - So therefore perhaps this needs to be challenged in the Law courts as it is not in the interest of the British people and to consider this being an abuse of authority by the government.
attributes.background: The Prime minister Theresa May should resign forthwith as it is clear from the media outlets and news comments that she has lost the confidence of the country and the Petition calling on her to do so will allow the public to have a choice on their views as to whether they support the motion.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
